original_text: The Philistine army came together. They were ready to fight the Israelites. They met together near Socoh, a town in Judah. They put up their tents at Ephes Dammim between Socoh and Azekah. Samuel 16 Samuel 18
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들이 그들의 군대를 모으고 싸우고자 하여 유다에 속한 소고에 모여 소고와 아세가 사이의 에베스담밈에 진 치매

sentences.original_text: They were ready to fight the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이스라엘 사람들과 싸울 준비가 되었다

sentences.original_text: Socoh was a town in Judah
They put up their tents at Ephes Dammim
Ephes Dammim was between Socoh and Azekah
